SENDR_CELL_NO2 , CRAL_IDV_TNO AS SENDR_CELL_NO3 , LOCARA_TNO AS SENDR_TEL_NO1 , EXNO_ENCR AS SENDR_TEL_NO2 , IDV_TNO AS SENDR_TEL_NO3 , SPP_ZIP AS SENDR_ZIP_NO , CST_NM AS SENDR_NM , (SELECT SUB1.AS_IST_OJ_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ SUB1 WHERE SUB1.CNTR_NO = #{custNo} AND SUB1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND SUB1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3460' AND SUB1.MTR_STAT_CD != '3' AND SUB1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) AS RTN_AS_IST_OJ_NO , PDCT_PD_CD AS GDS_CD , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE PD_CD = PDCT_PD_CD ) AS GDS_NM , PD_QTY AS GDS_QTY , SUBSTR(V1.FST_RGST_DTM,1,8) AS RCPT_YMD FROM ( SELECT AC211.CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO ,AC211.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN ,AC211.AS_IST_OJ_NO ,VS106.SPP_IVC_NO AS TRACKING_NO , ( CASE WHEN #{reqdvCd} = '01' AND (SELECT COUNT(1) /* 이전 집하지시 신규체크 0체크 */ FROM TB_SVPD_SPP_AK_RS_IZ T1 WHERE T1.SPP_BZS_CST_ID = '30473216' AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{custNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.SPP_IVC_NO = VS106.SPP_IVC_NO AND T1.SPP_RCP_DV_CD = '02' ) = 0 THEN 'Y' WHEN #{reqdvCd} = '01' AND NVL((SELECT SPP_AK_RCPDT /* 이전 집하지시 중복체크 */ FROM TB_SVPD_SPP_AK_RS_IZ V1 WHERE V1.CNTR_NO = AC211.CNTR_NO AND V1.CNTR_SN = AC211.CNTR_SN AND V1.SPP_IVC_NO = VS106.SPP_IVC_NO AND V1.SPP_BZS_CST_ID = '30473216' AND V1.SPP_AK_RS_CD = 'S' AND V1.SPP_RCP_DV_CD = '02' AND V1.SPP_AK_SN = (SELECT MAX(SPP_AK_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_SPP_AK_RS_IZ T1 WHERE T1.SPP_BZS_CST_ID = '30473216' AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{custNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.SPP_IVC_NO = VS106.SPP_IVC_NO AND T1.SPP_AK_RS_CD = 'S' AND T1.SPP_RCP_DV_CD = '02') AND NVL((SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SPP_AK_RS_CD = 'S' THEN 1 END),0) AS U_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_SPP_AK_RS_IZ T1 WHERE T1.SPP_BZS_CST_ID = '30473216' AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{custNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.SPP_IVC_NO = VS106.SPP_IVC_NO AND T1.SPP_RCP_DV_CD = '02' AND T1.SPP_AK_RCPDT = '01' ) , 0) - NVL((SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SPP_AK_RS_CD = 'S' THEN 1 END),0) AS R_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_SPP_AK_RS_IZ T1 WHERE T1.SPP_BZS_CST_ID = '30473216' AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{custNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.SPP_IVC_NO = VS106.SPP_IVC_NO AND T1.SPP_RCP_DV_CD = '02' AND T1.SPP_AK_RCPDT = '02' ) , 0) = 0 ),'01') = '02' THEN 'Y'
WHEN #{reqdvCd} = '02' AND NVL((SELECT SPP_AK_RCPDT /* 이전 집하지시 중복체크 */ FROM TB_SVPD_SPP_AK_RS_IZ V1 WHERE V1.CNTR_NO = AC211.CNTR_NO AND V1.CNTR_SN = AC211.CNTR_SN AND V1.SPP_IVC_NO = VS106.SPP_IVC_NO AND V1.SPP_BZS_CST_ID = '30473216' AND V1.SPP_AK_RS_CD = 'S' AND V1.SPP_RCP_DV_CD = '02' AND V1.SPP_AK_SN = (SELECT MAX(SPP_AK_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_SPP_AK_RS_IZ T1 WHERE T1.SPP_BZS_CST_ID = '30473216' AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{custNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.SPP_IVC_NO = VS106.SPP_IVC_NO AND T1.SPP_AK_RS_CD = 'S' AND T1.SPP_RCP_DV_CD = '02') AND NVL((SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SPP_AK_RS_CD = 'S' THEN 1 END),0) AS U_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_SPP_AK_RS_IZ T1 WHERE T1.SPP_BZS_CST_ID = '30473216' AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{custNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.SPP_IVC_NO = VS106.SPP_IVC_NO AND T1.SPP_RCP_DV_CD = '02' AND T1.SPP_AK_RCPDT = '01' ) , 0) - NVL((SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SPP_AK_RS_CD = 'S' THEN 1 END),0) AS R_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_SPP_AK_RS_IZ T1 WHERE T1.SPP_BZS_CST_ID = '30473216' AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{custNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.SPP_IVC_NO = VS106.SPP_IVC_NO AND T1.SPP_RCP_DV_CD = '02' AND T1.SPP_AK_RCPDT = '02' ) , 0) = 1 ),'02') = '01' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS SEND_AVAIL_YN , (SELECT MAX(SPP_AK_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_SPP_AK_RS_IZ T1 WHERE T1.SPP_BZS_CST_ID = '30473216' AND T1.SPP_RCP_DV_CD = '02' AND T1.CNTR_NO = AC211.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = AC211.CNTR_SN ) AS V_SEQ FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ AC211 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ VS106 ON AC211.CNTR_NO = VS106.CNTR_NO AND AC211.CNTR_SN = VS106.CNTR_SN AND AC211.CST_SV_ASN_NO = VS106.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE AC211.CNTR_NO = #{custNo} AND AC211.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND AC211.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1112' ) M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_SPP_AK_RS_IZ V1 ON SPP_IVC_NO = TRACKING_NO AND SPP_BZS_CST_ID = '30473216' AND SPP_RCP_DV_CD = '02' AND V1.CNTR_NO = M1.CNTR_NO AND V1.CNTR_SN = M1.CNTR_SN AND SPP_AK_SN = M1.V_SEQ INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T3 /*계약주소관계*/ ON M1.CNTR_NO = T3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND M1.CNTR_SN = T3.DTL_CNTR_SN AND T3.ADRPC_TP_CD = (SELECT MAX(V2.ADRPC_TP_CD) FROM WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL V2 WHERE V2.DTL_CNTR_NO = T3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND V2.DTL_CNTR_SN = T3.DTL_CNTR_SN AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN V2.VL_STRT_DTM AND V2.VL_END_DTM AND V2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') /*1 계약주소, 2 배달주소, 3 설치주소*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T3.VL_STRT_DTM AND T3.VL_END_DTM AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T4 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON T3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID /*계약주소지ID*/ AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN GBSDBS.TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T5 ON T4.ADR_ID = T5.ADR_ID /*이해욱이사님,이진성프로님과 협의 설치, AS는 배정시에 주소를 사용 해야 하기 때문에 TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ 에 ADR_ID 를 추가 하기로 함. 테이블이 변경 되면, T4.ADR_ID 를 T1.ADR_ID 으로 수정 해야 함*/ AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
SELECT IS_DRM_AUTKY_VAL AS TOKKEN_NUM FROM TB_SVPD_SPP_BZS_AUTKY_IS_IZ WHERE IS_RQDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND DTA_DL_YN= 'N'
